Question: With SQL, how can you return the number of not null records in the “Persons” table?

O1: UPDATE Persons SET LastName=’Hansen’ INTO LastName=’Nilsen’
O2: MODIFY Persons SET LastName=’Nilsen’ WHERE LastName=’Hansen’
O3: MODIFY Persons SET LastName=’Hansen’ INTO LastName=’Nilsen’
O4: UPDATE Persons SET LastName=’Nilsen’ WHERE LastName=’Hansen’

O2: SELECT city FROM weather WHERE humidity = 95
